<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="hibernate-search-00170">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.properties" pattern="hibernate.search.default.elasticsearch.path_prefix"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Property hibernate.search.default.elasticsearch.path_prefix not available anymore">
                    <message>This property is not available anymore. Substitute with the Hibernate Search 6 equivalent: `hibernate.search.backend.path_prefix`.</message>
                    <link href="https://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/search/6.0/migration/html_single/#configuration-property-reference" title="Hibernate Search 5 to 6 Migration: Configuration Property Reference"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
